title: (x) "Fight gravity" peculiar semi-serif rounded modular face - Flashboy {Angel}
content:
Hi all.

I'm trying to identify this font.  
Anyone knows what's the name/foundry ?

Tx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034439im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample2_1_5055.jpg)
author: jrsilva

comments.content: Feels like a T-26 typeface but I haven't seen it. [Goodnight](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034439/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/Goodnight) and [Basix](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034439/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/Basix) have some similarities.

"Goodnight" is very close but it isn't the one. Thank'a anyway.

Anyone knows what font is this?
One of Jacob Fischer's (Pizzadude) creations... [Flash Boy](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034439/http:/www.dafont.com/flash-boy.font?text=Fight+gravity) slightly modified.

Thank you Angel71 !!!  
That's the one!

I love this Forum :)
